_source.short_desc: Allow patients to book appointments online. Decrease costs and time spent on administrative tasks. Seamless EHR integration.
_source.long_desc: Improve patient access to care and manage bookings more efficiently with an eBooking feature. Seamless EHR integration. Reduce admin hassle and relieve the burden on your staff. Allow patients to book, cancel, and reschedule their appointments online, without having to call the clinic. Significantly decreasing costs and time spent on administrative tasks. Get full control over your schedule and availabilities. Customize attributes like duration, cancellation policy, reminder content, and more.
_source.target_audience:
- Primary care
- Medical clinics
- Hospitals
- Health systems
- Urgent care
- Walk-in/retail clinics
- Pharmacies 
- Government/Public Health Authorities
- Vaccination/flu shot clinics

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Self-service appointment scheduling with the world's friendliest scheduling tool, so you can save time for the rest of your to-do list.
related_products.features: Meet the personal scheduling assistant that works 24/7 behind the scenes to fill your calendar & take busywork off your plate. From the moment clients book with you, Acuity is there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations to you and your clients, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule on their own, and process payments or accept donations. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly even as business get busier. All you need to do is show up at the right time.

Save time and give clients the wow-worthy experience they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

Already recognized as the intuitive scheduling leader for more than 10 million people around the world, Calendly also offers extended capabilities for teams with powerful collaboration functionality, robust administration controls, and enterprise-grade security and compliance. Integrations with Zoom, Salesforce, Google, Microsoft, Slack, & more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Scheduling software helps businesses organize and manage personnel's schedules. Employee Scheduling solutions often show work schedules of different employees side by side to allow managers to easily match tasks to people with the appropriate skill level. This software also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and keep scheduling process up to date with the most current information. Employee Scheduling software is related to Appointment Scheduling software, Scheduling software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Scheduling software assists with patient, staff, and facilities scheduling for the medical industry. These applications automate a broad range of business process functions for medical offices. Doctors and administrators use Medical Scheduling software to manage their appointment calendars, staff scheduling, patient records, and billing and invoicing. Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Scheduling software automates the scheduling of events, employees, rooms and other resources. Organizations use these applications to manage the planning of internal and external activities. Typically Scheduling software provides tools such as a shared calendar providing real-time project, task, employee and resource scheduling as well as a variety of forecasting, allocation and resource management features. Often other details, such as resource categorization, location details, timesheet records and employee skill-sets can be edited, updated and managed from the scheduling interface. Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Facility Management software and Appointment Scheduling software.

_source.short_desc: Improve the patient experience and meet new virtual healthcare expectations with fresh patient engagement software.
_source.long_desc: Pomelo Health is a Patient Engagement Software Provider designed to improve the patient experience and streamline workflows. Our digital patient engagement tools include online booking, appointment reminders, mobile patient intake, digital forms, secure messaging, telemedicine, queue management, and more. Pomelo Health software fully integrates with the leading EMRs. Trusted by over 9,000 healthcare providers and improving the healthcare experience of 20 million+ patients across North America.
_source.target_audience:
- Primary care
- Medical clinics
- Hospitals
- Health systems
- Urgent care
- Walk-in/retail clinics
- Pharmacies 
- Government/Public Health Authorities
- Vaccination/flu shot clinics

media.caption: Send mass communications to your patients in just a few clicks. Reach targeted groups (such as patients in priority groups for vaccination, like those with allergies, or otherwise vulnerable) and include images, documents, and appointment booking links.

Spare your staff valuable hours during the intake process by digitizing forms that patients can complete on their smart device. Completed forms can be synced to the patient?s chart automatically, or they can be reviewed by your staff beforehand.
Engage with your patients through secure, compliant video consultations, without any additional software downloads or registrations.
Message your patients one-on-one and securely share sensitive documents like test results or treatment plans.
Allow your patients to book their appointments online and save over 120 hours of staff-time per employee, per month.

related_products.short_desc: Automate your client bookings, cancellations, reminders & payments using the worlds friendliest online scheduling software.
related_products.features: Meet the personal assistant for your schedule (only better) that works 24/7, behind the scenes to fill your calendar and take work off your plate. From the moment clients book with you, Squarespace is there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule on their own, and process payments so your day-to-day runs smoother even as business get busier. All you need to do is show up at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: Mend is the Leading Telehealth, Automated Patient Payments, & Patient Engagement Platform. Reduce no-show rates & engage more patients.
related_products.features:
Telehealth, Patient Engagement, & Complete Digital Patient Management: Automated Patient Payments, Appointment Reminders, AI-Predicted No Shows, Enhanced Virtual Waiting Room, Patient Self-Scheduling & Digital Forms. #1 Rated Support & Custom Workflows. 

Mend Has 98.3% Engagement, 99.85% Video Connection, & Single Digit No-Show Rates.

Mend Has Automation Technology To Integrate With Any EHR, PMS, or Other Systems. Perfect Fit For Large Provider Groups.

related_products.short_desc: Everything you need to run a better practice. Practice management software that offers charting, scheduling, billing, payments & more.

Everything you need to run a better practice.

Our practice management software comes equipped with features such as medical charting software, SOAP notes software, predictive charting, patient assessment software and more to help you run a better practice

related_products.short_desc: TimeTap is a feature-rich, highly customizable patient appointment scheduling tool trusted by medical institutions around the world.
related_products.features:
TimeTap is a feature-rich online patient scheduling tool that streamlines appointment booking for esteemed healthcare organizations around the world and provides a client-focused approach. 

TimeTap's scheduling software is highly customizable and designed for medium to large organizations that need a robust patient scheduling solution.  Our software is HIPAA and GDPR compliant - giving you a highly secure software that you can trust worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: The Ultimate Patient-1st Engagement Solution. For 20 years SR has been the benchmark by which all others measure themselves.
related_products.features: The Ultimate Patient-1st Engagement Solution. For 20 years SR has been the benchmark by which all others measure themselves. And we're still leading! Let us show you what you should expect from an integrated, patient acquisition and engagement solution!  As the individual practices we started out serving have grown, we've added specialized features for multi-unit operations. We now support many of the nation's largest health systems and retail-based networks.

related_products.short_desc: Fully branded white label appointment scheduling for enterprise or as a reseller integrating scheduling into an existing platform.
related_products.features:
Three Customer Groups:

Enterprise - Fully branded version of our software (YourCompanyBooking vs Bookafy) sales and support teams. 

Integrator - White label scheduling integration into an existing product offering. Example: CRM adding scheduling. Implement in days, not years. 

Small business - Our product is robust... we have 2-way sync w/ Google, Ical, Outlook, Office 365 and Outlook Exchange, an Open API, Payments, Classes, unlimited users, unlimited appointment types, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Make online self-scheduling straightforward and hassle-free with LeadSquared's HIPAA compliant Patient Scheduling Software.
related_products.features: Make online self-scheduling straightforward and hassle-free with LeadSquared's HIPAA compliant Patient Scheduling Software. User-friendly forms sync with doctors' calendars and auto-assigns patients to doctors. Use APIs to schedule appointments from patient portals. Make phone bookings easy and reduce call center wait times and ensure glitch-free appointment execution. Automatically notify care managers and doctors about the appointments and remind patients.

related_products.short_desc: Powered by WRS Health, a cloud-based EHR & PM solution, integrating every aspect of your practice on a single platform.
related_products.features:
WRS Health is a cloud-based integrated electronic health records (EHR) solution that offers practice management, revenue cycle management and billing services.

The solution includes modules for charting, medical billing, patient scheduling, appointment reminders, order management, eRx/EPCS, image management, secure e-faxing, disease management and more.

related_products.short_desc: Waitwhile is a queue management system, built to eliminate wait times. Trusted by 10k+ businesses incl. IKEA & Lululemon.
related_products.features: Waitwhile is a smart waitlist and scheduling platform that helps organizations bust their lines and create awesome wait experiences. Waitwhile solves all aspects of queuing - from letting guests check in online, showing wait times and keeping everyone informed via SMS and email. Plus, a powerful API to integrate with. Forever free to use for 100 guests per month.

related_products.short_desc: Flexible, affordable and beautifully simple to use appointment scheduling & booking software for small businesses and sports clubs
related_products.features: Appointment scheduling and booking software for small businesses that's powerful, simple to use and affordable. Ultimate scheduling flexibility that allows multiple staff, resources and locations. Take bookings that require combined resources and staff. Manage online and manual payments all in one place.  Create public and membership bookings for services, classes, courses and workshops. Your customers can see and manage their bookings via their own completely independent account.

related_products.short_desc: Get more appointments (and keep patients coming back) with NexHealth's leading online scheduling and patient experience platform.
related_products.features:
Get more appointments (and keep patients coming back) with NexHealth's real-time online scheduling, communication, and marketing automation platform.

NexHealth is the only platform that fully integrates with your PM / EHR system to effortlessly provide patients the convenience and simplicity they want at every step of the patient journey. NexHealth has bi-directional sync with your EHR: your online schedule reflects actual availability and your new patients are added directly to your EHR.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use and affordable telehealth solution. Unlimited video calls, messaging, file-sharing, and recording for only 24/mo/provider.
similar_products.features: HIPAA Video is the leader in online healthcare communications. We equip Providers and healthcare professionals with a simple, customizable video solution that meets their telehealth needs. We understand the importance of HIPAA Compliance and provide only the most secure channels for handling sensitive and private information. We provide our award-winning service with no strings attached. You are in no obligation to sign long-term contracts and we will never ask you for your credit card to start.

similar_products.short_desc: Keona Health Desk is AI-powered patient self-scheduling into your EHR that reduces calls (~30% monthly).
similar_products.features:
Patient Self-Scheduling is built for patients: Cut calls 25-40%, boost appointments 7-15 per provider, improve patient safety, with no passwords or downloads. 

(Care)fully designed for providers: providers keep control of their schedule, appointments are equitably distributed directly into your PM, & health campaigns offer advanced scheduling.

Health Desk can be used to manage other workflows including: nurse triage, referral services, prescription refills, post discharge follow-up.

similar_products.short_desc: Mend is the Leading Telehealth, Automated Patient Payments, & Patient Engagement Platform. Reduce no-show rates & engage more patients.
similar_products.features:
Telehealth, Patient Engagement, & Complete Digital Patient Management: Automated Patient Payments, Appointment Reminders, AI-Predicted No Shows, Enhanced Virtual Waiting Room, Patient Self-Scheduling & Digital Forms. #1 Rated Support & Custom Workflows. 

Mend Has 98.3% Engagement, 99.85% Video Connection, & Single Digit No-Show Rates.

Mend Has Automation Technology To Integrate With Any EHR, PMS, or Other Systems. Perfect Fit For Large Provider Groups.

similar_products.short_desc: TimeTap is a feature-rich, highly customizable patient appointment scheduling tool trusted by medical institutions around the world.
similar_products.features:
TimeTap is a feature-rich online patient scheduling tool that streamlines appointment booking for esteemed healthcare organizations around the world and provides a client-focused approach. 

TimeTap's scheduling software is highly customizable and designed for medium to large organizations that need a robust patient scheduling solution.  Our software is HIPAA and GDPR compliant - giving you a highly secure software that you can trust worldwide.

similar_products.short_desc: Make online self-scheduling straightforward and hassle-free with LeadSquared's HIPAA compliant Patient Scheduling Software.
similar_products.features: Make online self-scheduling straightforward and hassle-free with LeadSquared's HIPAA compliant Patient Scheduling Software. User-friendly forms sync with doctors' calendars and auto-assigns patients to doctors. Use APIs to schedule appointments from patient portals. Make phone bookings easy and reduce call center wait times and ensure glitch-free appointment execution. Automatically notify care managers and doctors about the appointments and remind patients.

similar_products.short_desc: Get more appointments (and keep patients coming back) with NexHealth's leading online scheduling and patient experience platform.
similar_products.features:
Get more appointments (and keep patients coming back) with NexHealth's real-time online scheduling, communication, and marketing automation platform.

NexHealth is the only platform that fully integrates with your PM / EHR system to effortlessly provide patients the convenience and simplicity they want at every step of the patient journey. NexHealth has bi-directional sync with your EHR: your online schedule reflects actual availability and your new patients are added directly to your EHR.

similar_products.short_desc: Smart Care Routing is a self-service clinical AI chat system for symptom checking, virtual triage, and navigating healthcare journeys.
similar_products.features:
Clearstep's Smart Care Routing product uses clinical AI chat technology to improve patient-consumer experiences and engagement with healthcare organizations. Features three unique modules:

1. Virtual Triage: Empowers patient-consumers to triage themselves to the right care and services.

2. Clinical Journeys: Automates key patient-consumer touchpoints and reduces administrative burdens.

3. Patient Services: Streamlines patient follow-ups and remote monitoring workflows.

similar_products.short_desc: Simple to use cloud-based online booking and appointment tool for salons & barbers with no monthly fees.

similar_products.short_desc: SimplePractice is the #1 HIPAA compliant practice management software. Join 100000+ thriving health & wellness professionals.

similar_products.short_desc: Online Booking System with reminders for all service companies! Let your clients book themselves online - Includes free version.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Medical Records software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Medical Records tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Medical Records software (EMR) automates the documentation, storage and retrieval of patient records. EMR software streamlines data entry, automates diagnosis and CPT code selection, minimizes required paper records, reduces transcription costs, provides up-to-date patient histories and reduces the turnaround time for patient visits and retrieving lab results. Using Electronic Medical Records solutions, doctors, offices and healthcare organizations save time, reduce medical errors, perform less paperwork and provide more accurate diagnoses for their patients. Electronic Medical Records software is related to Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Scheduling software assists with patient, staff, and facilities scheduling for the medical industry. These applications automate a broad range of business process functions for medical offices. Doctors and administrators use Medical Scheduling software to manage their appointment calendars, staff scheduling, patient records, and billing and invoicing. Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.
